pageProps.title: Motivation
pageProps.content:
### Which theory of motivation is the most advanced now?
Self-determination theory.

### Motivation
1. Internal - process is important.
2. External - result (externalized) is important.

The most effective (in terms of long-term results and happiness) proportion is more internal motivation with less (not zero!) external motivation.
